product_name: Shimano Ultegra FD-6700 10-Speed Front Derailleur - Double
long_description: When quick shifts and race speeds are the norm, the Shimano FD-6700 Ultegra 10-speed double front derailleur doesn't just get it done ... it does its job beautifully. Wide outer and inner link design boosts strength and rigidity. You'll notice featherlight downshifting and a smooth shifting stroke thanks to the perfect amount of spring tension. Even when out of the saddle, shifting from low to high gears is smooth and easy. The Shimano FD-6700 Ultegra 10-speed front derailleur is for use with double-chainring crankset.
short_description: When quick shifts and race speeds are the norm, the Shimano FD-6700 Ultegra 10-speed double front derailleur doesn't just get it done ... it does its job beautifully.
